Name: Element Infusion I: Darkness
Desc:
Summons a dark elemental that grants you its powers.
Can be toggled On/Off
Lv. 10 Effect: Can learn the 2nd Job Skill, Adaptive Darkness

H.Old: Hitting an enemy with a throwing star skill has a 20% chance to place a Mark of Darkness that may stack up to 2 times. Marked enemies receive 80% DoT per stack every second for 5 sec. and have 4% DEF ignored per stack.
H.New: Hitting an enemy with a throwing star skill has a 20% chance of placing a Mark of Darkness that stacks up to 2 times. The marked enemy receives 80% DoT every sec. per stack for 15 sec., and the Night Walker's attacks on the enemy ignore 4% of its DEF per stack.

h1.Old: Hitting an enemy with a throwing star skill has a 20% chance to place a Mark of Darkness that may stack up to 2 times. Marked enemies receive 80% DoT per stack every second for 5 sec. and have 4% DEF ignored per stack.
